Typedef Documentation

typedef NITF_BOOL(* NITF_ROW_SOURCE_NEXT_ROW)(void *algorithm, nitf_Uint32 band, NITF_DATA *buffer, nitf_Error *error)

NITF_ROW_SOURCE_NEXT_ROW - Next row function prototype.

Parameters:
algorithm - The algorithm object
band - The requested band
buffer - The buffer to receive the data
error - Error object for error returns
Returns:
Returns true on success. On failure the error object is set
